info.name: Happy Holidays! 2021
info.description: Keeping the tradition from last year, here's my new holiday greeting for this year!

renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
#define PI 3.1415
#define TEMPO 2.0

struct Note
{
    float frq;
    float off;
    float dur;
};

const float C3 = 130.81;
const float D3 = 146.83;
const float Ef3 = 155.56;
const float E3 = 164.81;
const float F3 = 174.61;
const float G3 = 196.00;
const float Af3 = 207.65;
const float A3 = 220.00;
const float B3 = 246.94;
const float C4 = 261.63;
const float D4 = 293.66;

const float WHOLE_NOTE = 1.0;
const float HALF_NOTE = 1.0 / 2.0;
const float THIRD_NOTE = 1.0 / 3.0;
const float QUARTER_NOTE = 1.0 / 4.0;
const float EIGHTH_NOTE = 1.0 / 8.0;

const Note[] jingleBellRock = Note[](
Note(C4, 0.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(C4, 0.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE), 
Note(C4, 1.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE), 
Note(B3, 2.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(B3, 2.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(B3, 3.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE),

Note(A3, 4.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(B3, 4.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE), 
Note(A3, 5.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE), 
Note(E3, 5.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE + HALF_NOTE),

Note(A3, 8.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(B3, 8.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(A3, 9.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE),
Note(E3, 10.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE), 
Note(G3, 11.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE),

Note(A3, 12.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(B3, 12.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(A3, 13.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE), 
Note(F3, 14.0 / TEMPO, HALF_NOTE),

Note(D3, 16.0 / TEMPO, THIRD_NOTE),
Note(E3, 16.66 / TEMPO, THIRD_NOTE),
Note(F3, 17.33 / TEMPO, THIRD_NOTE), 
Note(G3, 18.0 / TEMPO, THIRD_NOTE),
Note(A3, 18.66 / TEMPO, THIRD_NOTE),
Note(G3, 19.33 / TEMPO, THIRD_NOTE),

Note(D3, 20.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE), 
Note(E3, 20.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(F3, 21.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(G3, 21.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE + HALF_NOTE), 

Note(A3, 25.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(Af3, 25.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(A3, 26.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(Af3, 26.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(A3, 27.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE), 

Note(A3, 28.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE),
Note(Ef3, 29.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(E3, 29.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE + HALF_NOTE),

Note(C4, 32.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(C4, 32.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE), 
Note(C4, 33.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE), 
Note(B3, 34.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(B3, 34.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(B3, 35.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE),

Note(A3, 36.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(B3, 36.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE), 
Note(A3, 37.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE), 
Note(E3, 37.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE + HALF_NOTE),

Note(A3, 40.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(B3, 40.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(A3, 41.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(E3, 41.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE + QUARTER_NOTE),
Note(G3, 43.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE),

Note(A3, 44.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE), 
Note(B3, 44.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(A3, 45.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE),
Note(F3, 46.0 / TEMPO, HALF_NOTE),

Note(D3, 48.0 / TEMPO, THIRD_NOTE),
Note(E3, 48.66 / TEMPO, THIRD_NOTE),
Note(F3, 49.33 / TEMPO, THIRD_NOTE), 
Note(G3, 50.0 / TEMPO, THIRD_NOTE),
Note(A3, 50.66 / TEMPO, THIRD_NOTE),
Note(G3, 51.33 / TEMPO, THIRD_NOTE),

Note(D3, 52.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE), 
Note(E3, 52.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(F3, 53.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(G3, 53.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE + HALF_NOTE),

Note(A3, 57.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE), 
Note(A3, 57.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(B3, 58.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE),
Note(G3, 59.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE),

Note(C4, 60.0 / TEMPO, HALF_NOTE + QUARTER_NOTE),
Note(C4, 63.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(C4, 63.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),

Note(D4, 64.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE + EIGHTH_NOTE), 
Note(C4, 65.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE + QUARTER_NOTE),
Note(A3, 67.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(C4, 67.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),

Note(D4, 68.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE + EIGHTH_NOTE), 
Note(C4, 69.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE + QUARTER_NOTE + EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(C4, 71.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),

Note(C4, 72.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE), 
Note(B3, 73.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE),
Note(A3, 74.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE),
Note(G3, 75.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE),

Note(E3, 76.0 / TEMPO, HALF_NOTE),
Note(C4, 79.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(C4, 79.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),

Note(D4, 76.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE + EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(C4, 77.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE + QUARTER_NOTE),
Note(A3, 79.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(C4, 79.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),

Note(D4, 80.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE + EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(C4, 81.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE + HALF_NOTE),

Note(G3, 84.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE), 
Note(G3, 85.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE),
Note(A3, 86.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(A3, 86.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE), 
Note(A3, 87.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(A3, 87.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),

Note(B3, 88.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE), 
Note(A3, 88.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE + EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(G3, 89.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE + QUARTER_NOTE),

Note(C4, 92.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(C4, 92.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE), 
Note(C4, 93.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE), 
Note(B3, 94.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(B3, 94.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(B3, 95.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE),

Note(A3, 96.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(B3, 96.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE), 
Note(A3, 97.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE), 
Note(E3, 97.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE + HALF_NOTE),

Note(A3, 100.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(B3, 100.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(A3, 101.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(E3, 101.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE + QUARTER_NOTE),
Note(G3, 103.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE),

Note(A3, 104.0 / TEMPO, WHOLE_NOTE), 

Note(A3, 108.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE), 
Note(C4, 109.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE),
Note(D4, 110.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE),
Note(C4, 111.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE),

Note(Af3,112.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE), 
Note(C4, 113.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(D4, 113.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE + HALF_NOTE),

Note(C4, 116.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE + EIGHTH_NOTE), 
Note(A3, 117.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(B3, 118.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(A3, 118.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE), 
Note(G3, 119.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE),

Note(C4, 120.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE + EIGHTH_NOTE), 
Note(A3, 121.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(B3, 122.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(A3, 122.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE), 
Note(G3, 123.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE),

Note(C4, 124.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE + EIGHTH_NOTE), 
Note(A3, 125.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(B3, 126.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE),
Note(C4, 126.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE), 
Note(D4, 127.0 / TEMPO, QUARTER_NOTE),

Note(D4, 128.0 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE), 
Note(C4, 128.5 / TEMPO, EIGHTH_NOTE + HALF_NOTE + QUARTER_NOTE));

vec2 Inst(Note note, float time)
{
    vec2 ins = 0.4 * vec2(sin(2.0 * PI * note.frq * time) * exp(-0.3 / note.dur * (time - note.off)));
    ins += 0.4 * vec2(sin(2.0 * PI * note.frq * time) * exp(-0.3 / note.dur * (time - note.off)));
    ins = ins * ins * ins;

    return ins;
}

vec2 mainSound(int samp, float time)
{
    vec2 snd = vec2(0.0);
    float t = mod(time, 75.0); 
    int i;
    
    for(i = 0; i < jingleBellRock.length(); i++)
    {        
        Note note = jingleBellRock[i];
        
        if(t > note.off)
        {
        	snd += Inst(note, t);
        }
    }
    
    i = 0;
    return snd;
}
renderpass.name: Sound
